title: Analyze Citizen Report Trends
description: A city manager wants to know what the most common citizen complaints have been over the last year.

tasks.description: Retrieve all citizen service requests from the last 12 months.
Categorize and count the requests by type (e.g., 'pothole', 'graffiti', 'noise complaint').
tasks.expected_outcome: The system aggregates the data by category.

tasks.description: Generate a report showing the top 10 most frequent complaint types.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a summary report identifying 'potholes' and 'missed trash collection' as the top two issues.
